title: Italian Bean Soup - Pasta e fagioli

ingredients.content: 40 g extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for serving
230 g tinned borlotti beans, rinsed and drained
2 tsp fine sea salt, or to taste
2 pinches ground black pepper, or to taste

preparations.content: Place onions, garlic, lardons, oil and rosemary in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add carrots, celery and 100 g beans then blend <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides and lid of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add tomatoes, water and stock then cook <b>20 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add ditalini, season with salt and pepper then cook <b>time indicated on packet/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add remaining 130 g beans and cook <b>1 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Leave to stand in bowl with lid on for 5 minutes.
Pour into soup bowls, drizzle with a little olive oil and sprinkle over grated Parmesan. Serve hot.
